content.question: Which of the following questions could be tested to determine if an unknown white powder was a hydroxide from group 2 and not from group 1?

choices.label: Does the compound conduct electricity when dissolved in distilled water?
Does the compound dissolve significantly in distilled water?

Does the compound form a precipitate when reacted with <math alttext="H N O 3" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>HNO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

Does the compound have a molar mass above <math alttext="50 grams per mole" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mn>50</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.25em"></mspace><mtext>g/mol</mtext></mrow></math>?

content.answer: Does the compound dissolve significantly in distilled water?

skill.text: 2.A: Identify a testable scientific question based on an observation, data, or a model.
